oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Top Floor students at Nashville's Stratford High School - 2017-07-14
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Poetry, dance and song performance by the Top Floor Students from Nashville's Stratford High School from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on July 14, 2017. A partnership between the Martha O'Bryan Center and the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments by David Bogart / (01:49) Introduction of Joya to introduce the performers / (02:35) Joya with opening comments / (03:01) Bad Dreams (Cordae) / (04:00) Step Dance Routine (The ASU Stuckers) / (06:04) Comments from instructor / (07:07) A Promise With No Regrets (Tiana Hatcher) / (08:27) Comments from instructor / (08:48) Gonna Mind My Business (Aria Romeson) / (10:43) Stand Up (Dottie Holland) / (12:56) Reminiscing (Kenny Owens) / (14:58) Fish Tank (Terrence Reid) / (16:58) Joya introduces next act / (17:14) Crooked Smiles - incomplete (Corde Ford) / (19:34) Crooked Smiles - complete version (Corde Ford) / (22:35) Comments from David Bogart / (26:34) Kristen's Song (Trio with lyrics by Kristen Hibdon) / (29:25) Program comments by David Bogart / (29:48) Final comments by unidentified / (32:02) Final comments by David Bogart / (32:59) FILE END
